title: Skrivelse til samtlige statsamter, Københavns Overpræsidium samt Rigsombudsmanden på Færøerne vedrørende inddrivelse af underholdsbidrag i udlandet i henhold til FN-konventionen af 20. juni 1956
documentHtml:
Den fulde tekst

Skrivelse til samtlige statsamter, Københavns Overpræsidium samt Rigsombudsmanden på Færøerne vedrørende inddrivelse af underholdsbidrag i udlandet i henhold til FN-konventionen af 20. juni 1956

Vedr. inddrivelse af underholdsbidrag i udlandet i henhold til FN-konventionen af 20. juni 1956.

Til orientering fremsendes herved en fra Haagerkonferencen om international privatret modtaget liste med oplysning om de udpegede centralmyndigheder i henhold til ovennævnte konvention.

Med venlig hilsen

Civilretsdirektoratet

Lars Thøgersen

HAGUE CONFERENCE ON PRIVATE INTERNATIONAL LAW

The Permanent Bureau of the Hague Conference on private international law presents its compliments to the National Organs and, in accordance with the Decision of the Eighteenth Session (Final Act, Part B):

"The Eighteenth Session,

(...)

7 Requests the Secretary General -

(...)

b to keep an up-to-date list of the authorities provided for under the New York Convention of 1956 and to communicate this list, once or twice a year, to all those authorities in the Menber States of the Hague Conference;",

./. has the honour to provide them with two copies of the list of the authorities provided for under the New York Convention of 20 June 1956 on the Recovery Abroad of Maintenance. This list has been compiled from information provided by either the Member States of the Conference which are Parties to the Convention, or by the Depositary of the Convention, the United Nations Treaties Section.

The Permanent Bureau would be grateful if the National Organs would communicate to it any changes that should be made to this list and forward it to the competent authorities concerned.

The Permanent Bureau avails itself of this opportunity to renew to the National Organs assurances of its highest consideration and esteem.

THE HAGUE, 17 December 1997

./. Enclosure mentioned.

To the National Organs

Copy for information to the Depositary of the Convention

CONFERENCE DE LA HAYE DE DROIT INTERNATIONAL PRIVE

Le Bureau Permanent de la Conference de La Haye de droit international prive presente ses compliments aux Organes nationaux et, conformement a la Decision de la Dix-huitieme session:

"La Dix-huitieme session,

(...)

7 Charge le Secretaire general:

(...)

b de tenir a jour la liste des autorites prevues par la Convention de New York de 1956 et de communiquer, au rythme d'une ou deux fois par annee cette liste a toutes ces autorites dans les Etats membres de la Conference de La Haye;",

./. a l'honneur de leur faire parvenir ci-joint deux exemplaires de la liste des autorites prevues par la Convention de New York du 20 juin 1956 sur le recouvrement des aliments a l'etranger. Cette liste a ete etablie sur la base de renseignements qui ont ete donnes, soit par les Etats membres de la Conference Parties a la Convention, soit par le depositaire de la Convention, la Section des Traites des Nations Unies.

Le Bureau Permanent serait reconnaissant aux Organes nationaux de lui faire part des modifications eventuelles a apporter a cette liste et de la communiquer aux autorites competentes concernees.

Le Bureau Permanent saisit cette occasion pour renouveler aux Organes nationaux les assurances de sa tres haute consideration.

LA HAYE, le 17 decembre 1997.

./. Annexe mentionnee.

Aux Organes nationaux

Copie a titre d'information au depositaire de la convention

LISTE DES AUTORITES PREVUES PAR LA CONVENTION DE NEW YORK DU 20 JUIN 1956 SUR LE RECOUVREMENT DES ALIMENTS A L'ETRANGER

Liste etablie a la suite d'une Decision de la Dix-huitieme session de la Conference sur la base de renseignements donnes par le depositaire de la Convention et certains des Etats parties a la Convention

LIST OF AUTHORITIES PROVIDED FOR UNDER THE NEW YORK CONVENTION OF 20 JUNE 1956 ON THE RECOVERY ABROAD OF MAINTENANCE

List drawn up following a Decision of the Eighteenth session of the Conference on the basis of information provided by the depositary of the Convention and some of the States Parties to the Concention

States Members of the Hague Conference om private international law which are parties to the New York Convention of 20 June 1956 on the Recovery of Maintenance Abroad

Etats membres de la Conference de la Haye de droit international prive Parties a la Convention de New York du 20 juin 1956 sur le recouvrement des aliments a l'etranger

  REPUBLIQUE            A First situation: the Central African  

  CENTRAFRICAINE /     Republic has concluded a judicial convention:  

  CENTRALAFRICAN       1. With France, under the Agreement on  

  REPUBLIC             Co-operation in Judicial matters, dated 18  

                       January 1965, the Agency which transmits or  

                       receives the maintenance claims is the Minister  

                       of Justice, Keeper of the Seals. Claims are  

                       received or sent in the form of writs of  

                       debt, judgments or decrees, and the Ministers  

                       of Justice of the two States transmit them to  

                       the competent official, in this case the  

                       Procureur general at the Court of Appeals of  

                       the respondent's residence, for execution.  

                       2. With the African countries signatories  

                       of the Tananarive Convention of 12 September  

                       1961, the exchanges are made through the  

                       Procureurs generaux at the Court of Appeals.  

                        B Second situation: the Central African  

                       Republic has not concluded a judicial  

                       convention with a particular country:  

                       Claims for recovery of maintenance are  

                       transmitted by the Procureur general at the  

                       Court of Appeals or the Minister of Justice,  

                       who refers them to the Minister for Foreign  

                       Affairs of the Central African Republic, who  

                       refers them to the Minister for Foreign Affairs  

                       of the country where the respondent resides.  

                       Claims originated abroad follow the same  

                       procedure.
